author: rbb
msg: Make lingering close access the socket directly, instead of relying on
BUFF.  This has been tested, but all we can determine is that it doesn't
fail, not that it works.  This needs to be tested much better.

author: rbb
msg: Make ap_rflush use the flush bucket properly, and remove the BUFF code

author: rbb
msg: Fix internal redirects.  They should have their own HTTP_HEADER filter
instance, and we need to remove the main-request's HTTP_HEADER.

author: stoddard
msg: Correct a check to see if we are attempting to remove a filter that has
already been removed from the stack. Hummm, seems to me we should not
attempt to remove filters multiple times....
